entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -28.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
